messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Japan travel for teens
messages.msgSnippet: hmmmm, now if they just offered one for the adults of the teens!  My daughter (17) would just LOVE THIS!  LOL, I got her hooked on Sushi several years ago and
messages.messageBody:
hmmmm, now if they just offered one for the adults of the teens! My daughter
(17) would just LOVE THIS! LOL, I got her hooked on Sushi several years ago
and I've taught her a little Japanese from college days! Actually, she's
standing here right now BEGGING me to call! OMGOSH! Can you imagine how I'd be
if she left that for that long, especially since I went so crazy when she was
ONLY GONE a week in Montana? And, I don't think I "could take" the plane
flight over there! Thanks to one friend, I spent an entire day (the day she
returned from Montana) on line, EVERY 15 to 20 minutes, checking the status of the
flight (there's a site on line you can check exactly where the plane is, their
ground speed, and the height the plane is flying at).

Tracy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Japan travel for teens
messages.msgSnippet: A friend of mine who conducts orientation sessions for teens traveling to Japan, asked me to post this scholarship notice for homeschoolers. Youth For
messages.messageBody:
A friend of mine who conducts orientation sessions for teens
traveling to Japan, asked me to post this scholarship notice for
homeschoolers.

Youth For Understanding USA offers students the adventure of a
lifetime -
the opportunity to explore other countries and cultures, master new
languages, and discover themselves. If living in a new country for a
summer, semester, or year and learning about a different culture
sounds like
your kind of challenge, then it's time to go global with Youth For
Understanding. YFU USA is proud to offer more than 300
scholarships. You
have the chance to win a full or partial scholarship to live overseas
as a
YFU exchange student. Check out our scholarship opportunities at
www.yfu-usa.org or call 1-800-TEENAGE and you can GO GLOBAL!

Caroline
